==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=云南}}

===Etymology===
From the abbreviation of {{zh-l|雲嶺|Yunling Mountains}} + {{zh-l|南|south}} to mean "the south of the Yunling Mountains", referring to the location of the ancient county after which the province was named
